Sentencas: Pyrolysis of ladder-like silsesquioxanes in oxygen-free atmosphere leads to the formation of silicon oxycarbides (black glasses).
Titulo: Thermal evolution of ladder-like silsesquioxanes during formation of black glasses

Sentencas: Black glasses are materials of amorphous silica structure where some amount of O-2-ions were replaced by C-4-ions.
Titulo: Thermal evolution of ladder-like silsesquioxanes during formation of black glasses

Sentencas: This exchange leads to local increase in bonds density and therefore improvement in mechanical, thermal, and chemical properties.
Titulo: Thermal evolution of ladder-like silsesquioxanes during formation of black glasses

Sentencas: Thanks to this modification, silicon oxycarbide glasses can be used in a variety of applications like: protective coatings and interconnectors in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Thermal evolution of ladder-like silsesquioxanes during formation of black glasses

Sentencas: Xerogels were prepared by sol-gel method, and ladder-like silsesquioxanes were used as precursors.
Titulo: Thermal evolution of ladder-like silsesquioxanes during formation of black glasses

Sentencas: Samples were burned at 200-1000 degrees C in inert atmosphere.
Titulo: Thermal evolution of ladder-like silsesquioxanes during formation of black glasses

Sentencas: Structural studies in the middle infrared range (MIR) and SEM with EDX confirmed the presence of SiOC bonds in obtained materials.
Titulo: Thermal evolution of ladder-like silsesquioxanes during formation of black glasses

Sentencas: MIR analysis of solid samples together with TG/dTG measurements allowed defining the process for the formation of black glasses.
Titulo: Thermal evolution of ladder-like silsesquioxanes during formation of black glasses
